DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in North America. The aim of this trial is to investigate the efficacy of biphasic insulin aspart 30 in subjects with type 2 diabetes not achieving glycaemic targets on OADs (oral anti-diabetic drugs).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Failing on OADs
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus for at least 12 months HbA1c between 7.514.5% (inclusive) at screening Insulin na√Øve An antidiabetic regimen that has been stable for at least 3 months prior to screening An antidiabetic regimen that includes a minimum of 2 OADs Use of any insulin preparations within the past 6 months Active proliferative retinopathy or maculopathy requiring treatment within 6 months prior to screening
